i just got my first clear voice on a digital recorder  a cheap 
chinese one from the drugstore.  the more times i played it the 
clearer it got UNTIL  i turned the recorder off prior to transferring 
to computer.  probably whatever biases the flash memory isnt quite up 
to what it should be.

on 1n34 "conditioned" diode; this is one of many things i use to test 
for extremely low level non-randomness in noise floor.

ordinarily, i am literally bedevilled by "angels" trying to speak 
into receiver.  gradually i am establishing that a principle 
called "giant negentropy" may be partly due to the efforts of living 
or once living entities from multiple "elsewheres" trying to cohere 
or phase-align noise --which is basically what all life does anyway, 
we increase the sun's entropy and temporarily reverse our local 
entropy.

duh

in english:

life, including life that we cant presently comprehend , like trevor 
constable's  sky creatures or the "rods"  or remnant cast-off shells 
of human souls may be hard wired to alter its environment thereby 
having a microscopic modulating effect on the local physical laws and 
constants.

it only SOUNDS  esoteric; you already know it.


i can make some extra 1n34 diodes for unusual recording opportunities 
i expect first week of april but i need an address to send them to.

i run a bunch of yahoo groups of my own and i know that it 
isnthealthy to start sending home addresses back and forth so maybe 
one brave foolcan volunteer.
